mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, pwd, role, organize_name FROM user
SELECT user.user_id, username, upload_time FROM user, upload WHERE organize_name = #{organizeName} AND user.user_id = upload.user_id GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY upload_time DESC

SELECT user_id, username FROM user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user.user_id FROM user, upload WHERE organize_name = #{organizeName} AND user.user_id = upload.user_id) AND organize_name = #{organizeName}
SELECT count(distinct user.user_id) FROM user, upload WHERE organize_name = #{organizeName} AND user.user_id = upload.user_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user.user_id FROM user, upload WHERE organize_name = #{organizeName} AND user.user_id = upload.user_id) AND organize_name = #{organizeName}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(upload_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS hour_start, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM upload GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(upload_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') ORDER BY hour_start;
